page.title: 09HOME BREWERIES
page.content: In 1905 the founder,Sir John Robinson, was knighted by Edward V11.The site of Home Breweries used to be fields and a cricket pitch called the"Wash Tub". Home Breweries is so called because it used barley from Home Farm in Bestwood It makes 129600 pints every 3 hours. Killingleys,the Wine Department,was established in 1745.It imports wines and spirits from France,Portugal,Italy Germany,Scotland and the West Indies. Killingley's Bond House has wines such as Cinzano,Martini,Rum and Sherry. Apollo make soft drinks such as orange lemonade,cola,cherryade,appleade and raspberyade in cans and bottles.Home Breweries are spending twenty-three million pounds in six years,for improvements.It will then be one of the largest breweries in Europe. Melanie Tuttle.
